https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Jack gets fed up with his publishing job in New York and his girlfriend and moves to Colorado, where he plans to write a novel. There he takes over his uncle's lodge and cafe, but runs into unusual problems with the oddball locals. Easier Said
